qas.question: What type of tolerances does the USB standard specify for compliant USB connectors?
Why were loose tolerances allowed for compliant USB connectors?

answers.text: to minimize physical incompatibilities in connectors from different vendors

qas.question: How is a weakness addressed in some other connector standards?

answers.text: the USB specification also defines limits to the size of a connecting device

qas.question: Due to size restrictions compliant devices must what?

answers.text: fit within the size restrictions or support a compliant extension cable that does
